short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get TANĂNANA radio playing queue and add tracks to spotify library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tanananify is an extensions that allows users to see the playing queue of the online radio TANĂNANA and give them the possibility to add any of the tracks in their Spotify library. 

If the track is present on Spotify, then clicking on any title will open a new tab with the Spotify page of that track. The user can also click on the artist and get to their Spotify page and explore more of their tracks. Clicking on the volume animation, the user will be redirected to the TANANANA radio page and listen to it. 

It offers a streamlined flow for users who listen to online radio while doing other tasks on the browser and are curious what track is playing, without having to leave their current tab.
